revised_title: Corrigenda: The Influence of Radiomimetic Substances on Deoxyribonucleic Acid Synthesis and Function Studied in Escherichia Coli Phage Systems IV
tldr: This article corrects errors in a previous study on the influence of radiomimetic substances on deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) synthesis in Escherichia coli. The study investigates the effects of alkylation on colony-forming ability and phage-synthetic capacity of E. coli strain B and its mutants. The corrected text suggests that ribonucleic acids may be the reactive substrate essential for capacity.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Genetics and Molecular Biology
